span.b: NMSA is in ongoing communication with the New Mexico Department of Health and the Public Education Department, and we are following and will continue to follow all guidelines regarding COVID-19.

div.p: On this page you can find below our plans and responses to Governor Michelle Lujan Grisham’s Public Health Emergency declaration and New Mexico Department of Health (DOH) and Public Education Department (PED) directives and recommendations.

p.span: We are committed to sharing accurate information with our families as it becomes available. We recognize that the unknowns of the current global situation are stressful; we aim to provide information to support the health and preparedness of the NMSA community, and to answer questions as we are able.
Please refer to the New Mexico Department of Health’s website for up to date information regarding the coronavirus in our state by clicking below.

div.p: Information for our school’s families can be found below.

div.p: The State of New Mexico has activated school districts throughout the state to provide free breakfast and lunch for any person 18 or under, regardless of whether they are enrolled in their local district. This means that our students can receive free lunch and breakfast at local schools throughout the state.
NMSA started weekend snack bag curbside distribution every Friday from 2 to 4.
